entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
